page.description: Undo a set of changes started with BeginTransaction, but not yet applied (CommitTransaction hasn't been called).

return.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

page.discussion: The RollBackTransaction() method undoes a set of changes started with BeginTransaction(), but not yet applied with CommitTransaction().
